  :root {
    /**
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     * SPACING VARIABLES
     *
     * We are using a spacing inspired from frameworks like Tailwind CSS.
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     */
    --spacing-0-5: 0.125rem; /* 2px */
    --spacing-0-75: 0.2rem; /* 2px */
    --spacing-1: 0.25rem; /* 4px */
    --spacing-1-5: 0.375rem; /* 6px */
    --spacing-1-75: 0.41rem; /* 6px */
    --spacing-2: 0.5rem; /* 8px */
    --spacing-2-5: 0.625rem; /* 10px */
    --spacing-3: 0.75rem; /* 12px */
    --spacing-3-5: 0.875rem; /* 14px */
    --spacing-4: 1rem; /* 16px */
    --spacing-4-5: 1.125rem; /* 18px */
    --spacing-5: 1.25rem; /* 20px */
    --spacing-5-5: 1.375rem; /* 22px */
    --spacing-6: 1.5rem; /* 24px */
    --spacing-6-5: 1.625rem; /* 26px */
    --spacing-7: 1.75rem; /* 28px */
    --spacing-7-5: 1.875rem; /* 30px */
    --spacing-8: 2rem; /* 32px */
    --spacing-8-5: 2.125rem; /* 34px */
    --spacing-9: 2.25rem; /* 36px */
    --spacing-9-5: 2.375rem; /* 38px */
    --spacing-10: 2.5rem; /* 40px */
    --spacing-11: 2.75rem; /* 44px */
    --spacing-12: 3rem; /* 48px */
    --spacing-14: 3.5rem; /* 56px */
    --spacing-16: 4rem; /* 64px */
    --spacing-18: 4.5rem; /* 72px */
    --spacing-18-5: 4.8rem; /* 72px */
    --spacing-20: 5rem; /* 80px */
    --spacing-22: 5.6rem; /* 80px */
    --spacing-24: 6rem; /* 96px */
    --spacing-28: 7rem; /* 112px */
    --spacing-29: 7.5rem; /* 112px */
    --spacing-32: 8rem; /* 128px */
    --spacing-36: 9rem; /* 144px */
    --spacing-40: 10rem; /* 160px */
    --spacing-44: 11rem; /* 176px */
    --spacing-48: 12rem; /* 192px */
    --spacing-52: 13rem; /* 208px */
    --spacing-56: 14rem; /* 224px */
    --spacing-60: 15rem; /* 240px */
    --spacing-64: 16rem; /* 256px */
    --spacing-72: 18rem; /* 288px */
    --spacing-80: 20rem; /* 320px */
    --spacing-96: 24rem; /* 384px */

    /* Container */
    --container-max-width: 1600px;
    --container-narrow-max-width: 1350px;
    --container-gutter: var(--spacing-6);
    --section-outer-spacing-block: var(--spacing-12);
    --section-inner-max-spacing-block: var(--spacing-10);
    --section-inner-spacing-inline: var(--container-gutter);
    --section-stack-spacing-block: var(--spacing-8);

    /* Grid gutter */
    --grid-gutter: var(--spacing-6);

    /* Product list settings */
    --product-list-row-gap: var(--spacing-8);
    --product-list-column-gap: var(--grid-gutter);

    /* Form settings */
    --input-gap: var(--spacing-2);
    --input-height: 4.4rem;
    --input-padding-inline: 1.8rem;

    /* Other sizes */
    --sticky-area-height: calc(var(--sticky-announcement-bar-enabled, 0) * var(--announcement-bar-height, 0px) + var(--sticky-header-enabled, 0) * var(--header-height, 0px));

    /* RTL support */
    --transform-logical-flip: 1;
    --transform-origin-start: left;
    --transform-origin-end: right;

    /**
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     * TYPOGRAPHY
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     */

    /* Font properties */

    /* heading styles Condensed  */
    /* heading style Condensd Bold */
    --heading-font-condensed-bold: 'helvetica-condensed-bold';
    --heading-font-weight-condensed-bold: 700;
    --heading-font-style-condensed-bold: normal;
    --heading-text-transform-condensed-bold: normal;
    --heading-letter-spacing-condensed-bold: -0.02em;

    /* Text style 2 */
    --text-font-family-condensed: 'helvetica-condensed';
    --text-font-weight-condensed: 400;
    --text-font-style-condensed: normal;
    --text-letter-spacing-condensed: 0.0em;

     /* heading styles Neue  */
    /* heading style Neue Bold */
    /* heading style Neue 1 */
    --heading-font-neue-bold: 'helvetica-neue-lt-bold';
    --heading-font-weight-neue-bold: 700;
    --heading-font-style-neue-bold: normal;
    --heading-text-transform-neue-bold: normal;
    --heading-letter-spacing-neue-bold: -0.02em;

    /* Text style Neue 2 */
    --text-font-neue-md: 'helvetica-neue-lt-md';
    --text-font-weight-neue-md: 500;
    --text-font-style-neue-md: normal;
    --text-letter-spacing-neue-md: 0.0em;

    /* Text style Neue 3 */
    --text-font-family-neue: 'helvetica-neue-lt';
    --text-font-weight-neue: 400;
    --text-font-style-neue: normal;
    --text-letter-spacing-neue: 0.0em;

     /* Font sizes Mobile */
     --text-h0: 10.0rem;
     --text-h1: 7.5rem;
     --text-h1-22: 3.0rem;
     --text-h2: 3rem;
     --text-h3: 2.5rem;
     --text-h0-neue: 3.5rem;
     --text-h1-neue: 3rem;
     --text-h2-neue: 2.5rem;
     --text-h3-neue: 2.5rem;
     --text-p-1: 2.2rem;
     --text-p-2: 2.0rem;
     --text-p-3: 1.8rem;
     --text-p-4: 1.6rem;
     --text-p-5: 1.4rem;
     --text-p-6: 1.2rem;
     --text-p-7: 1.2rem;

     --text-p-2-25: 2.5rem;
     --text-newsletter-neue: 2rem;


    /* Line Heights Mobile */
    --line-h0: 10.0rem;
    --line-h1: 8.0rem;
    --line-h1-22: 3.0rem;
    --line-h2: 3rem;
    --line-h3: 2.5rem;
    --line-h0-neue: 3.5rem;
    --line-h1-neue: 3rem;
    --line-h2-neue: 2.5rem;
    --line-h3-neue: 2.5rem;
    --line-p-1: 2.4rem;
    --line-p-2: 2.2rem;
    --line-p-3: 2.0rem;
    --line-p-4: 1.8rem;
    --line-p-5: 1.6rem;
    --line-p-6: 1.4rem;
    --line-p-7: 1.2rem;

    --line-p-2-25: 3.5rem;

    /**
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     * COLORS
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     */

    /* Color settings */--accent: 11 98 120;
    --text-primary: 82 79 79;
    --background-primary: 255 255 255;
    --dialog-background: 255 255 255;
    --border-color: var(--text-color, var(--text-primary)) / 0.12;

    --color-focus: 34, 97, 197;
    --color-primary: 11, 98, 120;
    --color-primary-light: 182, 208, 215;
    --color-secondary: 151, 87, 75;
    --color-tertiery: 198, 96, 29;
    --color-tertiery-light: 254, 238, 222;

    --color-black: 0, 0, 0;
    --color-grey: 82, 79, 79;
    --color-light-grey: 168, 167, 167;
    --color-light: 236, 236, 236;
    --color-white: 255, 255, 255;
    --color-red: 224, 42, 42;
    --color-blue: 34, 97, 197;


    /* Button colors */
    --button-background-primary: 11 98 120;
    --button-text-primary: 255 255 255;
    --button-background-secondary: 255 255 255;
    --button-background-secondary-border: 82 79 79;
    --button-text-secondary: 82 79 79;

    /* Status colors */
    --success-background: 224 244 232;
    --success-text: 0 163 65;
    --warning-background: 255 246 233;
    --warning-text: 255 183 74;
    --error-background: 254 231 231;
    --error-text: 248 58 58;

    /* Product colors */
    --on-sale-text: 248 58 58;
    --on-sale-badge-background: 248 58 58;
    --on-sale-badge-text: 255 255 255;
    --sold-out-badge-background: 0 0 0;
    --sold-out-badge-text: 255 255 255;
    --primary-badge-background: 198 96 29;
    --primary-bestseller-background: 198 96 29;
    --primary-instyle-background: 11 98 120;
    --primary-badge-text: 255 255 255;
    --primary-badge-text-bestseller: 255 255 255;
    --primary-badge-text-instyle: 255 255 255;
    --star-color: 82 79 79;
    --product-card-background: 255 255 255;
    --product-card-text: 26 26 26;

    /* Header colors */
    --header-background: 255 255 255;
    --header-text: 82 79 79;

    /* Footer colors */
    --footer-background: 255 255 255;
    --footer-text: 26 26 26;

    /* Rounded variables (used for border radius) */
    --rounded-xs: 0.0rem;
    --rounded-sm: 0.0rem;
    --rounded: 0.0rem;
    --rounded-lg: 0.0rem;
    --rounded-full: 9999px;

    --rounded-button: 0.0rem;
    --rounded-input: 0.0rem;

    /* Box shadow */
    --shadow-sm: 0 2px 8px rgb(var(--text-primary) / 0.1);
    --shadow: 0 5px 15px rgb(var(--text-primary) / 0.1);
    --shadow-md: 0 5px 30px rgb(var(--text-primary) / 0.1);
    --shadow-block: 0px 18px 50px rgb(var(--text-primary) / 0.1);

    /**
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     * OTHER
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     */

    --cursor-close-svg-url: url(//www.brazilianblowout.com/cdn/shop/t/88/assets/cursor-close.svg?v=147174565022153725511726681172);
    --cursor-zoom-in-svg-url: url(//www.brazilianblowout.com/cdn/shop/t/88/assets/cursor-zoom-in.svg?v=154953035094101115921726681171);
    --cursor-zoom-out-svg-url: url(//www.brazilianblowout.com/cdn/shop/t/88/assets/cursor-zoom-out.svg?v=16155520337305705181726681180);
    --checkmark-svg-url: url(//www.brazilianblowout.com/cdn/shop/t/88/assets/checkmark.svg?v=77552481021870063511726681171);
  }

  [dir="rtl"]:root {
    /* RTL support */
    --transform-logical-flip: -1;
    --transform-origin-start: right;
    --transform-origin-end: left;
  }

  @media screen and (min-width: 1011px) {
    :root {
      /* Typography (font size) */
      --text-h0: 14.0rem;
      --text-h1: 10.0rem;
      --text-h1-22: 4.0rem;
      --text-h2: 6rem;
      --text-h3: 4rem;
      --text-h0-neue: 7.5rem;
      --text-h1-neue: 6rem;
      --text-h2-neue: 4rem;
      --text-h3-neue: 3rem;
      --text-p-1: 2.6rem;
      --text-p-2: 2.4rem;
      --text-p-3: 2.2rem;
      --text-p-4: 2.0rem;
      --text-p-5: 1.6rem;
      --text-p-6: 1.4rem;
      --text-p-7: 1.2rem;

      --text-newsletter-neue: 3rem;

      /* line heights */
      --line-h0: 14.0rem;
      --line-h1: 10.0rem;
      --line-h1-22: 4.0rem;
      --line-h2: 6rem;
      --line-h3: 4rem;
      --line-h0-neue: 7.5rem;
      --line-h1-neue: 6rem;
      --line-h2-neue: 4rem;
      --line-h3-neue: 3rem;
      --line-p-1: 2.8rem;
      --line-p-2: 2.6rem;
      --line-p-3: 2.4rem;
      --line-p-4: 2.2rem;
      --line-p-5: 1.8rem;
      --line-p-6: 1.6rem;
      --line-p-7: 1.4rem;

      

      /* Spacing */
      --container-gutter: 3rem;
      --section-outer-spacing-block: var(--spacing-16);
      --section-inner-max-spacing-block: var(--spacing-12);
      --section-inner-spacing-inline: var(--spacing-12);
      --section-stack-spacing-block: var(--spacing-12);

      /* Grid gutter */
      --grid-gutter: var(--spacing-8);

      /* Product list settings */
      --product-list-row-gap: var(--spacing-12);

      /* Form settings */
      --input-gap: 1rem;
      --input-height: 5.4rem;
      --input-padding-inline: var(--spacing-8);
    }
  }

  @media screen and (min-width: 1000px) {
    :root {
      /* Spacing settings */
      --container-gutter: var(--spacing-12);
      --section-outer-spacing-block: var(--spacing-18);
      --section-inner-max-spacing-block: var(--spacing-16);
      --section-inner-spacing-inline: var(--spacing-16);
      --section-stack-spacing-block: var(--spacing-12);
    }
  }

  @media screen and (min-width: 1150px) {
    :root {
      /* Spacing settings */
      --container-gutter: var(--spacing-12);
      --section-outer-spacing-block: var(--spacing-20);
      --section-inner-max-spacing-block: var(--spacing-16);
      --section-inner-spacing-inline: var(--spacing-16);
      --section-stack-spacing-block: var(--spacing-12);
    }
  }

  @media screen and (min-width: 1400px) {
    :root {
      --section-outer-spacing-block: var(--spacing-24);
      --section-inner-max-spacing-block: var(--spacing-18);
      --section-inner-spacing-inline: var(--spacing-18);
    }
  }

  @media screen and (min-width: 1600px) {
    :root {
      --section-outer-spacing-block: var(--spacing-24);
      --section-inner-max-spacing-block: var(--spacing-20);
      --section-inner-spacing-inline: var(--spacing-20);
    }
  }

  /**
   * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
   * LIQUID DEPENDANT CSS
   *
   * Our main CSS is Liquid free, but some very specific features depend on
   * theme settings, so we have them here
   * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
   */@media screen and (pointer: fine) {
        .button:not([disabled]):hover, .btn:not([disabled]):hover, .shopify-payment-button__button--unbranded:not([disabled]):hover {
          --button-background-opacity: 0.85;
        }

        .button--subdued:not([disabled]):hover {
          --button-background: var(--text-color) / .05 !important;
        }
      }</style><script>
  document.documentElement.classList.replace('no-js', 'js');

  // This allows to expose several variables to the global scope, to be used in scripts
  window.themeVariables = {
    settings: {
      showPageTransition: true,
      headingApparition: "split_fade",
      pageType: "index",
      moneyFormat: "${{amount}}",
      moneyWithCurrencyFormat: "${{amount}} USD",

      showDiscount: true,
      discountMode: "saving"
    },

    strings: {
      accessibilityClose: "Close",
      accessibilityNext: "Next",
      accessibilityPrevious: "Previous",
      addToCartButton: "Add to cart",
      soldOutButton: "Sold out",
      preOrderButton: "Pre-order",
      unavailableButton: "Unavailable",
      closeGallery: "Close gallery",
      zoomGallery: "Zoom",
      errorGallery: "Image cannot be loaded",
      soldOutBadge: "Sold out",
      discountBadge: "Save @@",
      sku: "SKU:",
      searchNoResults: "No results could be found.",
      addOrderNote: "Add order note",
      editOrderNote: "Edit order note",
      shippingEstimatorNoResults: "Sorry, we do not ship to your address.",
      shippingEstimatorOneResult: "There is one shipping rate for your address:",
      shippingEstimatorMultipleResults: "There are several shipping rates for your address:",
      shippingEstimatorError: "One or more error occurred while retrieving shipping rates:"
    },

    breakpoints: {
      'sm': 'screen and (min-width: 1011px)',
      'md': 'screen and (min-width: 1000px)',
      'lg': 'screen and (min-width: 1150px)',
      'xl': 'screen and (min-width: 1400px)',

      'sm-max': 'screen and (max-width: 1010px)',
      'md-max': 'screen and (max-width: 999px)',
      'lg-max': 'screen and (max-width: 1149px)',
      'xl-max': 'screen and (max-width: 1399px)'
    }
  };window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
      const isReloaded = (window.performance.navigation && window.performance.navigation.type === 1) || window.performance.getEntriesByType('navigation').map((nav) => nav.type).includes('reload');

      if ('animate' in document.documentElement && window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference)').matches && document.referrer.includes(location.host) && !isReloaded) {
        document.body.animate({opacity: [0, 1]}, {duration: 115, fill: 'forwards'});
      }
    });

    window.addEventListener('pageshow', (event) => {
      document.body.classList.remove('page-transition');

      if (event.persisted) {
        document.body.animate({opacity: [0, 1]}, {duration: 0, fill: 'forwards'});
      }
    });// For detecting native share
  document.documentElement.classList.add(`native-share--${navigator.share ? 'enabled' : 'disabled'}`);</script>
    <script>
    const CART_SESSION = "CART_SESSION";

    window.cartSession = {
        user:{
        },
        anonymous:{}
    };

    function initCartSession() {

        if(isLoggedin()){
            window.cartSession = getStorage(CART_SESSION);
        }

        if(isLoginPage()) {
            setStorage("FROM_LOGIN",true);
        }

        if(isAccountPage()) {
            document.querySelector(".logout-link-account").addEventListener("click",function(){
                clearSession();
            })
        } 
        
        if(document.querySelector(".logout-button-popup-new")) {
            document.querySelector(".logout-button-popup-new").addEventListener("click",function(){
                clearSession();
            })
        }
        
    }
    
    function digestCart(cart) {
        let obj =  cart.items.map(d=> ({"id":d.variant_id,"quantity":d.quantity}));
        if(isLoggedin()) {
            window.cartSession.user[getUserId()] = obj;
            window.cartSession.anonymous = {};
        } else  {
            window.cartSession.anonymous = obj;
            if(getStorage(CART_SESSION)) {
                window.cartSession.user = getStorage(CART_SESSION).user;
            }
            
        }
        setStorage(CART_SESSION,window.cartSession);
    }

    function restoreSession(cartNotification,reason) {
        if(isJustLogin()) {
            setStorage("FROM_LOGIN",false);
            let sessionData = getSessionData(getUserId());
            if(!hasValue(sessionData) && isConsumer() ) {
                transferSessionTo(getUserId());
            } else {
                fillCart(cartNotification,sessionData,false,()=> deleteStorage("FROM_LOGIN"));
            } 
        } else if(reason == 'SIGNUP_ERROR')  {
            let cartData = getAnonymousData();
            if(cartData && cartData.length > 0) {
                fillCart(cartNotification,cartData,false)

            }            
        }
    }

    function fillCart(cartNotification,cartData,openCart,callBack) {
            if(cartData && cartData.length > 0) {
                clearCart().then(clearResp=> {
                    if(cartData.length > 1) {
                        let formData = cartData.shift(1);
                        let items =  JSON.stringify({'items': cartData});
                        addToCart(prepareJSONBody(items)).then(cartResp1=> {
                            addToCart(prepareFormData(formData,cartNotification)).then(response=> {
                                cartNotification.renderContents(response,openCart);
                                if(callBack) {
                                    callBack();
                                }
                            })
                        })
                    } else {
                        addToCart(prepareFormData(cartData[0],cartNotification)).then(response=> {
                            cartNotification.renderContents(response,openCart);
                            if(callBack) {
                                callBack();
                            }
                        })
                    }
                })
            } else if(hasValue(getAnonymousData())) {
                cartData = getAnonymousData().map(d=> ({"id":d.id,"quantity":0}));
                if(cartData && cartData.length > 1) {
                    let formData = cartData.shift(1);
                    let items =  JSON.stringify({'updates': getUpdateObj(cartData)});
                    updateCart(prepareJSONBody(items)).then(cartResp1=> {
                        chageCart(prepareFormData(formData,cartNotification)).then(response=> {
                            cartNotification.renderContents(response,false);
                            if(callBack) {
                                callBack();
                            }
                        })
                    })
                } else {
                    chageCart(prepareFormData(cartData[0],cartNotification)).then(response=> {
                        cartNotification.renderContents(response,false);
                        if(callBack) {
                            callBack();
                        }
                    })
                }
            } else {
                getCart().then(cart=>{
                    if(cart.items.length > 0) {
                        clearCart().then(response =>{
                            location.reload()
                        })
                    }
                })
            }

           function getUpdateObj(data){
               let obj =  {}
               data.map(d=> d.id).forEach(elm=>{
                   if(elm){
                       obj[elm] = 0;
                   }
               })
               return obj;
           } 
    }

    function initForCheckout() {
        let logout$ = document.querySelector(".logged-in-customer-information__paragraph a");
        let login$ = document.querySelector(".layout-flex__item a");

        if(login$) {
            login$.href = "/account/login";
        } if(logout$) {
            logout$.href = "#"
            logout$.addEventListener("click",function() {
                clearSession();
            })
        }

    }

    function transferSessionTo(userId) {
        window.cartSession.user[userId] = getAnonymousData();
        window.cartSession.anonymous = {};
        setStorage(CART_SESSION,window.cartSession);
    }

    function prepareJSONBody(items){
        const config =  {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': `application/json` }
        };
        config.body = items;
        return config
    }

    function prepareFormData(cartData,cartNotification) {
        const config =  {
            method: "POST",
            headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': `application/javascript` }
        };
        config.headers['X-Requested-With'] = 'XMLHttpRequest';      
        delete config.headers['Content-Type'];
        let  formData = new FormData();
        formData.append('id',cartData.id);  
        formData.append('quantity',cartData.quantity);  
        formData.append('sections',cartNotification.getSectionsToRender().map((section) => section.id));  
        config.body = formData;
        return config;
    }

    function isLoggedin() {
        return window.User;
    }

    function getUserId() {
        return window.User.id;
    }

    function isConsumer() {
        return !window.User.tags.includes('professional');
    }

    function isProfessional() {
        return window.User.tags.includes('professional');
    }

    function clearSession() {
        clearCart().then(response=> {
            window.location.href =  '/account/logout';
        })   
    }

    function isLoginPage() {
        return window.location.pathname.includes("/account/login");
    }

    function isAccountPage() {
        return window.location.pathname == "/account";
    }

    function isJustLogin() {
        return isLoggedin()  && getStorage("FROM_LOGIN") == true;
    }


    function addToCart(data) {
        return fetch('/cart/add',data).then(response =>response.json())        
    }
    function chageCart(data) {
        return fetch('/cart/change',data).then(response =>response.json())        
    }
    function updateCart(data) {
        return fetch('/cart/update',data).then(response =>response.json())        
    }

    function getCart() {
        return fetch('/cart.js').then(response =>response.json())        
    }

    function clearCart() {
        return fetch('/cart/clear.js');        
    }

    function getSessionData(userId) {
        return getStorage("CART_SESSION") && getStorage("CART_SESSION").user[userId];
    }

    function getAnonymousData(userId) {
        return getStorage("CART_SESSION") && getStorage("CART_SESSION").anonymous;
    }

    function setStorage(key,value) {
        localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(value));
    }

    function getStorage(key) {
        let result = undefined
        if(localStorage.getItem(key)) {
            result = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(key));
        }
        return result;
    }

    function deleteStorage(key) {
        localStorage.removeItem(key);
    }

    function hasValue(data) {
        let flag = false
        if(Array.isArray(data)){
            flag =  data.length > 0;
        } else if (data != undefined && typeof(data) == 'object') {
            flag = Object.entries(data).length > 0;
        } else if (data != undefined && typeof(data) == 'string') {
            flag = data.length > 0;
        }
        return flag;
    }

</script>

<div class="section   section-boxed bg-custom text-custom" style="--background: 182 209 215; --text-color: 82 79 79;">
  <div class="section-stack section-stack--horizontal "><div class="section-stack__intro">
        <div class="v-stack gap-10"><div class="prose "><p class="body-text-medium regular-custom-font">Have a question? We’re here to help.</p><div class="body-text-condensed text-condensed-3"><p>Check out the most common questions our customers asked. Still have questions? Contact our Customer Support team at <a href="tel:18777797706">1-877-779-7706</a> during our regular business hours Monday - Friday 7:30AM (PT) - 5:30PM (PT). We are here to help!</p><p></p></div></div><div class="hidden lg:block"><div class="faq-availability">
<a class="button button--lg body-text-medium text-uppercase button--primary button--xl" href="/pages/contact-us">Contact Us</a>
</div></div></div>
      </div><div class="section-stack__main">
        <div class="accordion-box rounded bg-custom" style="--background: 182 209 215;"><details class=" accordion  group" aria-expanded="false" is="accordion-disclosure">
  <summary><div class="accordion__toggle  body-text-medium text-condensed-4 "><span>Q. Who Is The Best Candidate For The Brazilian Blowout?</span><span class="chevron group-hover:colors group-expanded:colors group-expanded:rotate"><svg role="presentation" focusable="false" width="10" height="7" class="icon icon-chevron-bottom" viewBox="0 0 10 7">
        <path d="m1 1 4 4 4-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"></path>
      </svg></span>
    </div>
  </summary>

  <div class="accordion__content body-text-condensed text-condensed-4"><div class="prose"><p>A. It has been our experience, that good candidates for the Brazilian Blowout are anyone who has frizzy, damaged or processed hair. We have performed the treatment on every hair type (fine/coarse/frizzy/curly), as well as hair that has been permed, Japanese straightened, relaxed and extensions. In doing so, we have found that with proper communication and a well considered application, everyone can benefit from the Brazilian Blowout smoothing treatment.</p></div></div>
</details><details class=" accordion  group" aria-expanded="false" is="accordion-disclosure">
  <summary><div class="accordion__toggle  body-text-medium text-condensed-4 "><span>Q.What Kind Of Look Will You Get From The Brazilian Blowout?</span><span class="chevron group-hover:colors group-expanded:colors group-expanded:rotate"><svg role="presentation" focusable="false" width="10" height="7" class="icon icon-chevron-bottom" viewBox="0 0 10 7">
        <path d="m1 1 4 4 4-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"></path>
      </svg></span>
    </div>
  </summary>

  <div class="accordion__content body-text-condensed text-condensed-4"><div class="prose"><p>A.The hair will be left totally frizz-free, shiny, effortlessly manageable and with plenty of body and bounce. There will still be the option to wear hair curly/wavy (depending on the hair type) and the freedom to blow dry hair smooth and straight in a fraction of the time invested prior to receiving the treatment.</p></div></div>
</details><details class=" accordion  group" aria-expanded="false" is="accordion-disclosure">
  <summary><div class="accordion__toggle  body-text-medium text-condensed-4 "><span>Q. Can I Still Receive A Brazilian Blowout If I Have Highlights And/Or Color?</span><span class="chevron group-hover:colors group-expanded:colors group-expanded:rotate"><svg role="presentation" focusable="false" width="10" height="7" class="icon icon-chevron-bottom" viewBox="0 0 10 7">
        <path d="m1 1 4 4 4-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"></path>
      </svg></span>
    </div>
  </summary>

  <div class="accordion__content body-text-condensed text-condensed-4"><div class="prose"><p>A.Yes, the Brazilian Blowout will actually improve the health of color-treated/highlighted hair by conditioning the hair while sealing the cuticle for enhanced color, reduced frizz and radiant shine.</p></div></div>
</details><details class=" accordion  group" aria-expanded="false" is="accordion-disclosure">
  <summary><div class="accordion__toggle  body-text-medium text-condensed-4 "><span>Q. Is The Brazilian Blowout Going To Make My Hair Straight?</span><span class="chevron group-hover:colors group-expanded:colors group-expanded:rotate"><svg role="presentation" focusable="false" width="10" height="7" class="icon icon-chevron-bottom" viewBox="0 0 10 7">
        <path d="m1 1 4 4 4-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"></path>
      </svg></span>
    </div>
  </summary>

  <div class="accordion__content body-text-condensed text-condensed-4"><div class="prose"><p>A. If your hair is wavy, the Brazilian Blowout will make your hair appear naturally straight and healthy. If your hair is very curly, it will minimize frizz while enhancing the appearance of the natural wave/curl. If you have straight, frizzy hair, this treatment will eliminate frizz and promote radiant shine.</p></div></div>
</details><details class=" accordion  group" aria-expanded="false" is="accordion-disclosure">
  <summary><div class="accordion__toggle  body-text-medium text-condensed-4 "><span>Q. How Long Does The Brazilian Blowout Last?</span><span class="chevron group-hover:colors group-expanded:colors group-expanded:rotate"><svg role="presentation" focusable="false" width="10" height="7" class="icon icon-chevron-bottom" viewBox="0 0 10 7">
        <path d="m1 1 4 4 4-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"></path>
      </svg></span>
    </div>
  </summary>

  <div class="accordion__content body-text-condensed text-condensed-4"><div class="prose"><p>A. The Brazilian Blowout will last for 10-12 weeks when using Brazilian Blowout aftercare. The Brazilian Blowout is a cumulative treatment, in that the more you receive it, the healthier the hair will be and the longer the result will last.</p></div></div>
</details><details class=" accordion  group" aria-expanded="false" is="accordion-disclosure">
  <summary><div class="accordion__toggle  body-text-medium text-condensed-4 "><span>Q. Can You Apply The Brazilian Blowout Directly On Top Of Other Relaxers And Straighteners?</span><span class="chevron group-hover:colors group-expanded:colors group-expanded:rotate"><svg role="presentation" focusable="false" width="10" height="7" class="icon icon-chevron-bottom" viewBox="0 0 10 7">
        <path d="m1 1 4 4 4-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"></path>
      </svg></span>
    </div>
  </summary>

  <div class="accordion__content body-text-condensed text-condensed-4"><div class="prose"><p>A. Yes. The Brazilian Blowout actually works best on chemically treated hair, and helps to improve the hair's condition by fortifying each strand with essential amino acids.</p></div></div>
</details><details class=" accordion  group" aria-expanded="false" is="accordion-disclosure">
  <summary><div class="accordion__toggle  body-text-medium text-condensed-4 "><span>Q. Will My Hair Lose Volume If I Receive The Brazilian Blowout?</span><span class="chevron group-hover:colors group-expanded:colors group-expanded:rotate"><svg role="presentation" focusable="false" width="10" height="7" class="icon icon-chevron-bottom" viewBox="0 0 10 7">
        <path d="m1 1 4 4 4-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"></path>
      </svg></span>
    </div>
  </summary>

  <div class="accordion__content body-text-condensed text-condensed-4"><div class="prose"><p>A. No, your hair will not lose volume as a result of receiving the Brazilian Blowout. Your hair will maintain its natural volume and you'll still receive great bend and memory when blow-drying and/or using a curling iron.</p></div></div>
</details><details class=" accordion  group" aria-expanded="false" is="accordion-disclosure">
  <summary><div class="accordion__toggle  body-text-medium text-condensed-4 "><span>Q. Can You Color Your Hair The Same Day You Receive A Brazilian Blowout?</span><span class="chevron group-hover:colors group-expanded:colors group-expanded:rotate"><svg role="presentation" focusable="false" width="10" height="7" class="icon icon-chevron-bottom" viewBox="0 0 10 7">
        <path d="m1 1 4 4 4-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"></path>
      </svg></span>
    </div>
  </summary>

  <div class="accordion__content body-text-condensed text-condensed-4"><div class="prose"><p>Yes, however, you must color your hair prior to having the Brazilian Blowout smoothing treatment. If you get a Brazilian Blowout and wish to get a color service at a later date, you will need to wait 2 weeks.</p></div></div>
</details></div>
      </div><div class="lg:hidden"><div class="faq-availability">
<a class="button button--lg body-text-medium text-uppercase button--primary button--xl" href="/pages/contact-us">Contact Us</a>
</div></div>
  </div>

          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "\u003cp\u003eA. If your hair is wavy, the Brazilian Blowout will make your hair appear naturally straight and healthy. If your hair is very curly, it will minimize frizz while enhancing the appearance of the natural wave\/curl. If you have straight, frizzy hair, this treatment will eliminate frizz and promote radiant shine.\u003c\/p\u003e"
          }
        },
{
          "@type": "Question",
          "name": "Q. How Long Does The Brazilian Blowout Last?",
          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "\u003cp\u003eA. The Brazilian Blowout will last for 10-12 weeks when using Brazilian Blowout aftercare. The Brazilian Blowout is a cumulative treatment, in that the more you receive it, the healthier the hair will be and the longer the result will last.\u003c\/p\u003e"
          }
        },
{
          "@type": "Question",
          "name": "Q. Can You Apply The Brazilian Blowout Directly On Top Of Other Relaxers And Straighteners?",
          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "\u003cp\u003eA. Yes. The Brazilian Blowout actually works best on chemically treated hair, and helps to improve the hair's condition by fortifying each strand with essential amino acids.\u003c\/p\u003e"
          }
        },
{
          "@type": "Question",
          "name": "Q. Will My Hair Lose Volume If I Receive The Brazilian Blowout?",
          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "\u003cp\u003eA. No, your hair will not lose volume as a result of receiving the Brazilian Blowout. Your hair will maintain its natural volume and you'll still receive great bend and memory when blow-drying and\/or using a curling iron.\u003c\/p\u003e"
          }
        },
{
          "@type": "Question",
          "name": "Q. Can You Color Your Hair The Same Day You Receive A Brazilian Blowout?",
          "acceptedAnswer": {
            "@type": "Answer",
            "text": "\u003cp\u003eYes, however, you must color your hair prior to having the Brazilian Blowout smoothing treatment. If you get a Brazilian Blowout and wish to get a color service at a later date, you will need to wait 2 weeks.\u003c\/p\u003e"
          }
        }
]
  }
</script>

function setCookie(name, value, days) {
  var expires = "";
  if (days) {
    var date = new Date();
    date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    expires = "; expires=" + date.toUTCString();
  }
  document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + "; path=/";
}

  
function getCookie(name) {
  var cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
  for (var i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
    var cookie = cookies[i].trim();
    if (cookie.indexOf(name + '=') === 0) {
      return cookie.substring(name.length + 1);
    }
  }
  return null;
}

</script>

  <script>
    document.getElementById('custom-live-chat').onclick = function(e) {
      e.preventDefault(); 
      if(document.getElementById("dummy-chat-button-iframe")){ 

        var iframe = document.getElementById("dummy-chat-button-iframe");
        iframe.classList.add("active");

        if(document.getElementById("dummy-chat-button-iframe").contentWindow.document.getElementById("dummy-chat-button")) {

          document.getElementById("dummy-chat-button-iframe").contentWindow.document.getElementById("dummy-chat-button").addEventListener("click", dummyChatButtonIframe(), true);

        }

      }else{
        var iframe = document.getElementById("ShopifyChat");
        iframe.classList.add("active");
        if(document.getElementById("ShopifyChat").contentWindow.document.getElementsByClassName("chat-toggle")[0]) {
          document.getElementById("ShopifyChat").contentWindow.document.getElementsByClassName("chat-toggle")[0].addEventListener("click", ShopifyChat(), true);
        }
      }
    }

    function dummyChatButtonIframe() {
          var iframe = document.getElementById("dummy-chat-button-iframe");
          var elmnt  = iframe.contentWindow.document.getElementById("dummy-chat-button");
          elmnt.click(); 
    }

    function ShopifyChat() { 
        var iframe = document.getElementById("ShopifyChat");
        var elmnt = iframe.contentWindow.document.getElementsByClassName("chat-toggle")[0];
        elmnt.click();
      }

    

  </script>
